executable.title: BRAINS Multi Resolution Registration
executable.description: This program does multiresolution registration on two lists of meshes.
executable.contributor: Wen Li and Luis Ibanez and Vincent Magnotta
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this work was provided by NIH/NINDS award NS050568

geometry.name: fixedMeshFileList
geometry.description: The list of file names for fixed meshes
geometry.label: Fixed Mesh File List

geometry.name: movingMeshFileList
geometry.description: The list of file names for moving meshes
geometry.label: Moving Mesh File List

integer-vector.name: rigidIterations
integer-vector.description: The number of iterations for rigid (rotational) registration in each level
integer-vector.label: Rigid Iterations

integer-vector.name: demonsIterations
integer-vector.description: The number of iterations for spherical demons registration in each level
integer-vector.label: Demons Iterations

integer-vector.name: smoothIterations
integer-vector.description: The number of iterations for smoothing the displacement in each level
integer-vector.label: Smoothing Iterations

double-vector.name: metricSignificance
double-vector.description: The percentage of change of metric (mean squared distance) used to stop the registration in each level
double-vector.label: Metric Significance

file.name: deformedFileNameRes4
file.description: Output mesh file name of the deformed fixed mesh in highest resolution level
file.label: Deformed Mesh File Name Res4

file.name: deformedFileName
file.description: Output mesh file name of the deformed original fixed mesh
file.label: Deformed Mesh File Name Res4

file.name: deformationFieldFileName
file.description: Output deformation field as vectors on the fixed mesh
file.label: Deformation Field on Fixed Mesh
